briefdescription.para: Gets the current motor position.
Gets the current motor position.
Clears the motor position counter.
Clears the motor position counter.
Set a goal velocity in ticks per second.

detaileddescription.para:
The range is -1500 to 1500, though motor position accuracy may be decreased outside of -1000 to 1000
motor
The motor port.
velocity
The goal velocity in -1500 to 1500 ticks / second
mav

briefdescription.para: Set a goal velocity in ticks per second.

parameterdescription.para: The goal velocity in -1500 to 1500 ticks / second

briefdescription.para: Set a goal position (in ticks) for the motor to move to.

detaileddescription.para: There are approximately 1500 ticks per motor revolution.

This function is more accurate if speeds between -1000 and 1000 are used.
motor
The motor port.
speed
The speed to move at, between -1500 and 1500 ticks / second
goal_pos
The position to move to (in ticks)
mtp

briefdescription.para: Set a goal position (in ticks) for the motor to move to.

parameterdescription.para: The speed to move at, between -1500 and 1500 ticks / second
The position to move to (in ticks)

briefdescription.para: Set a goal position (in ticks) for the motor to move to, relative to the current position.

parameterdescription.para: The speed to move at, between -1500 and 1500 ticks / second
The position to move to (in ticks) given the current position

briefdescription.para: Set a goal position (in ticks) for the motor to move to, relative to the current position.

parameterdescription.para: The speed to move at, between -1500 and 1500 ticks / second
The position to move to (in ticks) given the current position

memberdef.argsstring: (int motor, short p, short i, short d, short pd, short id, short dd)

briefdescription.para: Set the motor PID gains, represented as fractions.

briefdescription.para: Set the motor PID gains, represented as fractions.
Active braking to stop a motor.
Check if the motor has reached it's goal.
Wait until the motor is at it's goal.
Wait until the motor is at it's goal.
Set the motor pwm (percent power) command.

parameterdescription.para: A new motor pwm command between 0 and 100

briefdescription.para: Get the current motor pwm command.
Moves the given motor forward at full power.
Moves the given motor backward at full power.
Moves a motor at a percent velocity.

parameterdescription.para: The percent of the motors velocity, between -100 and 100.

briefdescription.para: Moves a motor at a percent velocity.

detaileddescription.para:
motor
The motor port.
percent
The percent of the motors velocity, between -100 and 100.
The New Apache language function call to include Native Americans.

briefdescription.para: Moves a motor at a percent power.

parameterdescription.para: The power of the motor, between -100 and 100.

briefdescription.para: Turns the specified motor off.
Turns all motors off.
Turns all motors off.
